metadata.title: CVE-2021-40562 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: A Segmentation fault caused by a floating point exception exists in Gpacthrough 1.0.1 using mp4box via the naludmx_enqueue_or_dispatch function inreframe_nalu.c, which causes a denial of service.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
